suggest.setasign/fpdf: FPDI will extend this class but as it is also possible to use TCPDF or tFPDF as an alternative. There's no fixed dependency configured.
suggest.setasign/fpdi-fpdf: Use this package to automatically evaluate dependencies to FPDF.
suggest.setasign/fpdi-tcpdf: Use this package to automatically evaluate dependencies to TCPDF.
suggest.setasign/fpdi-tfpdf: Use this package to automatically evaluate dependencies to tFPDF.
